title: Image Options Schema
description: Specific options for the "image" property type. Doc: https://manifest.build/docs/entities#image

sizes.description: An array containing named size options for the image.

name.description: The name identifier for this size variant.

fit.description: The method by which the image is resized when width and height are provided. See Sharp documentation about "fit": https://sharp.pixelplumbing.com/api-resize

items.description: An object representing the size options such as name, width, height, and fit for a specific size variant.
